price: Kwani? Hakika Mola wake Mlezi alikuwa akimwona!
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
footnotes: Bali atarejea, na atahisabiwa! Kwani Mola wake Mlezi alikuwa anamwona vyema yeye na vitendo vyake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
